title: Transfer
body: i did transfer to EU West and when i did that i saw that my name had change back to my old one and im wounder how do i get my new one back ?

replies.body: I'm not sure what your issue is. Are you wondering about your summoner name on your current account? If you can explain in a bit more depth, I'll be able to help out. Thanks

i did transfer my account from eu nordic and east to eu west and on eu nordic and east my name was RoS Mikkey. but now when i transfered i got my old name Mullen Meck so i was woundering how do i get my name back ? thanks for helping.

If the name is available, you can purchase a name change in the store and use that summoner name. If it's not available, you'll need to wait until it [becomes available](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-). 

Let me know if you have any questions.
